revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

[[Category:Shinies|Categoría:Variocolor]]

Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).

=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

Note: The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time.
